author: Jared Cobb
text:
We are starting to look at different ERP systems, and would really appreciate any insights from other local governments: 
1) Which software package does your government use? 
2) What modules are included?
3) How would you rate the effectiveness and efficiency of the system? 
4) Does the firm provide responsive customer support? 
5) Is the system updated on a regular basis?
Thanks in advance!
title: ERP Systems
